content: through 1 lp the chain yo draw through 2 lps twice the double_crochet r2 yo insert hk under 2 lps of the chain portion of last st and pull up lp yo and draw through 1 lp yo and draw through 2 lps twice repeat r2 for desired length front post double_crochet fpdc work double_crochet around post of st 1 row below inserting hk from front to back to front around the post back post double_crochet bpdc work double_crochet around post of st 1 row below inserting hk from back to front to back around the post extended single_crochet esc insert hk into next st yo and pull up a lp yo draw through 1 lp on hk yo and draw through remaining 2 lps on hk extended single_crochet 2 together esc2tog worked over 2 sts insert hk into 1st st yo and pull up a lp yo draw through 1 lp on hk 2 lps remain on hk insert hk into 2nd st yo and pull up a lp yo draw through 1 lp on hk yo draw through all 3 lps on hk tessa madson designs © 2026 you can wear sell or donate any items you have made
